text: Yā pana bhikkhunī agilānā dadhiṃ viññāpetvā bhuñjeyya paṭidesetabbaṃ tāya bhikkhuniyā gārayhaṃ ayye dhammaṃ āpajjiṃ asappāyaṃ pāṭidesanīyaṃ taṃ paṭidesemī ti
edit: Yā pana bhikkhunī agilānā dadhiṃ viññāpetvā bhuñjeyya paṭidesetabbaṃ tāya bhikkhuniyā gārayhaṃ ayye dhammaṃ āpajjiṃ asappāyaṃ pāṭidesanīyaṃ taṃ paṭidesemī ti

translations.transtext: 8. Should any bhikkhunī, not being ill, ask for curds and consume it, she is to acknowledge it: "Lady, I have committed a blameworthy, unsuitable act that ought to be acknowledged. I acknowledge it." [Bhikkhus' Pācittiya 39]
